forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
